exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="480" height="852" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_bg_png"/>
	<e:Image id="barbg" source="game_bar_png" x="47" verticalCenter="-329"/>
	<e:Image id="barSlider" source="game_bareffect_png" x="60" verticalCenter="-357.5"/>
	<e:Group id="blockGroup" height="480" width="480" x="0" bottom="206">
		<e:Rect height="514" width="480" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x9D7676"/>
		<e:Image id="skillIce" source="skill_ice_png" y="0" x="11" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="skillGroup" height="98" width="480" x="0" bottom="38">
		<e:Image id="skillResetBtn" source="game_skill0_png" x="28" y="1"/>
		<e:Image id="skillIceBtn" source="game_skill1_png" x="181" y="1"/>
		<e:Image id="skillTipBtn" source="game_skill2_png" x="333" y="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="resultGroup" height="515" width="480" bottom="172">
		<e:Image id="resultBg" source="resutl_bg_png" x="84" y="6"/>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="game_again_png" y="370" x="172"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="rankLabel" x="215" y="150" font="countdown_fnt" text="9" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
		<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="03:21" x="223" y="290" width="110" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xE51B1B"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="480" height="852" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_png"/>
	<e:Image id="title" source="game_title_png" y="15" x="30"/>
	<e:Group id="contentGroup" height="701" width="480" x="0" bottom="35">
		<e:Image id="waitBg" source="game_wait_png" x="59" y="14"/>
		<e:Image id="ruleBtn" x="28" y="635" source="game_rulebtn_png"/>
		<e:Image id="toolBtn" source="game_introbtn_png" x="262" y="634"/>
		<e:Image id="danmuBtn" source="game_dmbtn_png" y="557" x="164"/>
		<e:Image id="joinBtn" source="home_join_png" y="461" x="172"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="queueLabel" y="319" font="countdown_fnt" x="122" width="288" height="159" text="01" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="ruleGroup" height="852" width="480" x="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect id="closeRuleBtn" height="44" width="39" x="401" y="225"/>
		<e:Image source="game_rulebg_png" x="41" y="217" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Label text="123" x="89" y="303" width="312" height="386" textColor="0x4F1010" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="dmGroup" height="852" width="480" x="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect id="closeDmBtn" height="40" width="37" x="393" y="506"/>
		<e:Rect id="sendDmBtn" width="77" y="570" height="40" x="333"/>
		<e:Image source="game_dmbg_png" x="47" y="499" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:EditableText id="dmLabel" width="234" height="56" text="标签" x="89" y="546" textColor="0x581919" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="22"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
